sys_ux_client_script.name: List Modal

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_593b37c997317110e25972d6f053affb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="List">453b73c997317110e25972d6f053afdc</macroponent><name>List Modal</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
        api,
        event,
        imports,
        helpers
    }) {
    
    const { name, payload: { route, fields, params, size = 'md', ariaLabel }} = event;
    
    if (name === 'LIST#CLOSE_MODAL')
        helpers.modal.close();
    
    else if (name === 'LIST#OPEN_MODAL') {
        if (!route)
            return;
            
        api.setState('bare', true);
        api.setState('displayOptions', { size: size, label: ariaLabel });
        api.setState('contents', {
            route: route,
            fields: fields,
            params: params
        });
    }
    
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-09 04:57:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>593b37c997317110e25972d6f053affb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>List Modal</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Account Financials" source="x_323515_account_0">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Account Financials">571aa98d975c3110e25972d6f053af59</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_593b37c997317110e25972d6f053affb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-09 04:57:52</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
